cboCostEstimates.description: As Reported by the House Committee on the Judiciary on March 24, 2022, and Posted on the Website of the House Committee on Rules as Committee Print 117-37 on March 24, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: Estimated Changes in Direct Spending and Revenues Under H.R. 3617, the MORE Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 94 (Friday, May 28, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. NADLER:
H.R. 3617.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clauses 1, 3 and 18 of the
Constitution of the United States.
[Page H2679]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

title: Marijuana Opportunity Reinvestment and Expungement Act
